infos.value: Oh? A report coming from th' spy in Oelde's forces.
Got it. We'll be with yer soon.
We'll catch up to them in th' forest ahead.
Th' slugs are hiding in th' forest, planning to ambush us.
What does that have to do with anything?
There's more. Oelde's been wounded something fierce.
I...I'm the one who will kill him. I'll be the one to take Oelde's life!
Don't panic. No one'll lay a hand on him till we get there.
Heh heh heh. I can feel yer tremendous hatred.
Now get going! Today marks th' end o' th' Leonis bloodline!
